complement.description: Address complement or second line, such as apartment number

near_to.description: Some optional other reference for this address

line_address.description: Full in line mailing address, should include street, number and borough

province_code.description: The two-letter code for the province or state

name.description: The name of recipient, generally is the customer's name

country_code.description: Country calling code (without +), defined by standards E.123 and E.164

number.description: The actual phone number, digits only

phone.description: Customer phone number for this mailing address

checkout_link.description: URL to checkout page, if necessary, use (_id) where order unique ID must appear at URL

checkout_mobile_link.description: Optional checkout URL specific to mobile devices

status_link.description: URL to order status page, if necessary, use (_id) where order unique ID must appear

status_mobile_link.description: Optional status URL specific to mobile devices

medium.description: Parameter "utm_medium", the marketing medium: (e.g. cpc, banner, email)

campaign.description: Parameter "utm_campaign", the product, promo code, or slogan (e.g. spring_sale)

referring_site.description: The website that the customer clicked on to come to the shop

affiliate_code.description: Code to identify the affiliate that referred the customer

browser_ip.description: IP address of the browser used by the customer when placing the order

domain.description: Store domain name (numbers and lowercase letters, eg.: www.myshop.sample)

number.description: Order number, if not specified will be filled auto incrementing

code.description: Order code used by seller and customer for identification, should be unique

opened_at.description: Date and time when order was opened, in ISO 8601 standard representation

closed_at.description: If the order is closed, specify the date and time it occurred

cancelled_at.description: If the order is cancelled, specify the date and time it occurred

cancel_reason.description: If the order is cancelled, specify the reason why it was cancelled

updated_at.description: Last status change, date and time in ISO 8601 standard representation

financial_status.description: Financial status and date of change

updated_at.description: Last status change, date and time in ISO 8601 standard representation

fulfillment_status.description: Fulfillment status and date of change

currency_id.description: Designator of currency according to ISO 4217 (3 uppercase letters)

currency_symbol.description: Graphic symbol used as a shorthand for currency's name

subtotal.description: The sum of all items prices

tax.description: The sum of all the taxes applied to the order

extra.description: Sum of optional extra costs applied

payment_method_label.description: Name or summary of order payment method(s)

locale.description: Customer language two letter code, sometimes with region, eg.: pt_br, fr, en_us

verified.description: States whether or not the email address has been verified

display_name.description: The name of this Customer, suitable for display

family_name.description: The family name of this user, or "last name"

middle_name.description: The middle name(s) of this user

gender.description: Customer gender, female, male or third gender (X)

country_code.description: Country calling code (without +), defined by standards E.123 and E.164

number.description: The actual phone number, digits only

doc_country.description: Country of document origin, an ISO 3166-2 code

doc_number.description: Responsible person or organization document number (only numbers)

inscription_type.description: Municipal or state registration if exists

inscription_number.description: Municipal or state registration number (with characters) if exists

corporate_name.description: Registered company name or responsible fullname

locale.description: Customer language two letter code, sometimes with region, eg.: pt_br, fr, en_us

verified.description: States whether or not the email address has been verified

display_name.description: The name of this Customer, suitable for display

family_name.description: The family name of this user, or "last name"

middle_name.description: The middle name(s) of this user

gender.description: Customer gender, female, male or third gender (X)

country_code.description: Country calling code (without +), defined by standards E.123 and E.164

number.description: The actual phone number, digits only

title.description: Title for the gifts list, generally defined by the customer

description.description: Short text description for the gifts list

event_date.description: Date and time of the event in ISO 8601 standard representation

valid_thru.description: Validity of the list, until this date the gifts can be bought

authors.description: Authors of the list, if it is a wedding list, the names of the bride and groom

notification_email.description: Email address to be notified after gift purchase

contact.description: Email address or phone number to contact list owners

gifts_list_info.description: Informations about this customer gifts list

gift_to.description: If order is originated from a gifts list, specify customers who will receive the gift

budget_only.description: Whether the order is only budget, without payment transactions

label.description: Name of shipping method shown to customers

service_name.description: Name of service (shipping method) defined by carrier

service_code.description: Code of service defined by carrier

contract.description: Contract number of the shop with carrier, if exists

tracking_url.description: URI to carrier website to get package tracking status

rule.description: Selected shipping rule of this shipping method

app.description: Shipping method (by application) chosen by customer

price.description: Freight cost for this shipping line, without additionals

declared_value.description: The package value declared to carrier, generally the sum of all items prices

declared_value_price.description: Cost for the "declared value" additional service

own_hand.description: Whether the package must be delivered with additional service "own hand"

own_hand_price.description: Cost for the "own hand" additional service

receipt.description: If the package will be delivered with acknowledgment of receipt

receipt_price.description: Cost for the "acknowledgment of receipt" additional service

tag.description: Tag to identify object, use only lowercase letters, digits and underscore

other_additionals.description: List of other additional services for this shipping line

tag.description: Tag to identify object, use only lowercase letters, digits and underscore

rate.description: Tax rate as a function of package value

taxes.description: List of taxes or other additional services for this shipping line

discount.description: Discount on shipping price, negative if value was additionated (not discounted)

total_price.description: Total cost for this shipping line, with additionals and taxes

days.description: Number of days to post the product after purchase

working_days.description: If the deadline is calculated in working days

after_approval.description: Whether days will be counted after payment approval

days.description: Number of days for delivery after shipping

working_days.description: If the deadline is calculated in working days

scheduled_delivery.description: When delivery will be made on the ISO 8601 date time representation

tag.description: Tag to identify object, use only lowercase letters, digits and underscore

link.description: URI for carrier website to get the tracking status with this code

tracking_codes.description: List of codes for delivery status follow-up

issued_at.description: Date and time of issue, in ISO 8601 standard representation

updated_at.description: Last status change, date and time in ISO 8601 standard representation

status.description: Fulfillment status and date of change

items.description: List of order items related with this shipping line, use only if items are divided

notes.description: Optional notes with additional info about this shipping line

shipping_lines.description: List of shipping methods and address for this order

created_at.description: Date and time of transaction creation, in ISO 8601 standard representation

billing_address.description: The mailing address associated with the payment method

label.description: Name of payment method shown to customers

app.description: Payment method (by application) chosen by customer

payment_method.description: Payment method as defined by intermediator

buyer_id.description: ID of customer account in the intermediator

cvv_result_code.description: Response code from credit card company, such as AVS result code

bin.description: Issuer identification number (IIN), known as bank identification number (BIN)

company.description: Credit card issuer name, eg.: Visa, American Express, MasterCard

last_digits.description: Last digits (up to 4) of credit card number

error_code.description: Credit card processing standardized error code

credit_card.description: Credit card data, if payment was done with credit card

code.description: Ticket code, generally a barcode number

valid_thru.description: Date and time of expiration, in ISO 8601 standard representation

banking_billet.description: Banking billet data, if payment was done with banking billet

currency_id.description: Currency ID specific for this transaction, if different of order currency ID

currency_symbol.description: Currency symbol specific for this transaction

discount.description: Discount by payment method, negative if value was additionated (not discounted)

total.description: Total value, sum of all plots

intermediation.description: Intermediation fee, if transaction have an intermediary

updated_at.description: Last status change, date and time in ISO 8601 standard representation

status.description: Financial status and date of change

items.description: List of order items related with this transaction, use only if items are divided

notes.description: Optional notes with additional info about this transaction

transactions.description: List of payment transactions for this order

transaction_id.description: ID of transaction related with this event

date_time.description: Date and time of the event, in ISO 8601 standard representation

notification_code.description: Code of received notification with this status change

customer_notified.description: If customer was already notified of this event

payments_history.description: Historical of payments and financial status changes

shipping_line_id.description: ID of shipping line related with this event

date_time.description: Date and time of the event, in ISO 8601 standard representation

notification_code.description: Code of received notification with this status change

customer_notified.description: If customer was already notified of this event

variation_id.description: ID to specify the variation added to cart, if product has variations

sku.description: Product or variation unique reference code

name.description: Product or variation full name, or other label for this cart item

label.description: Title for this customization field, can be the grid title

option_id.description: Identify option if it was predefined (not custom value created by customer)

text.description: Option text value displayed for the client

colors.description: Option color palette (if the field involves colors), starting by main color

option.description: Option chosen or created by customer

attachment.description: URL of file attached by customer to this field

add_to_price.description: Price alteration due to this customization

tag.description: Tag to identify object, use only lowercase letters, digits and underscore

add_to_price.description: Additional value due to this gift wrap

price.description: Product sale price specifically for this cart

final_price.description: Final item price including additions due to customizations and gift wrap

name.description: The name of the loyalty points program

loyalty_points.description: Loyalty points earned by customer due to this order, program_id as property name

namespace.description: String to help distinguish who (or which app) created and can use the metafield
String to help distinguish who (or which app) created and can use the metafield
String to help distinguish who (or which app) created and can use the metafield

private_metafields.description: List of custom attributes, hidden by default, visible for the order buyers

notes.description: Optional notes with additional info about this order

staff_notes.description: Description and notes about this order, available only for shop administrators
